frame-title-1.title: `<frame>` or `<iframe>` elements do not have a title
frame-title-1.description: Screen reader users rely on frame titles to describe the contents of frames. [Learn more about frame titles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/frame-title).

items.snippet: <iframe id=":2.container" class="VIpgJd-ZVi9od-ORHb-OEVmcd skiptranslate" frameborder="0" src="#" style="visibility:visible">
items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

link-in-text-block-2.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
link-in-text-block-2.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).

items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.35:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #3366cc, surrounding text: #333333)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

target-size-3.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
target-size-3.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

items.snippet: <button class="updatedButtonCss_uhv7os6" data-testid="cookiePreferences" type="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-label="Cookie Preferences, opens a dedicated popup modal window">
items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (108.3px by 17px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 17px instead of at least 24px.

subItems.nodeLabel: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

table-fake-caption-4.title: Tables do not use `<caption>` instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute to indicate a caption.
table-fake-caption-4.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that tables use the actual caption element instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about captions](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/table-fake-caption).

items.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  The first child of the table should be a caption instead of a table cell
